entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Varennes
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
